title: A thought just occurred to me concerning Tahm's W and R
body:
What if he ults immediately after consuming an ally with w? will they get dragged along for the ride too? 

{{champion:429}} ults a support, gets eaten
Tahm eats one more ally via ult, and suddenly you have a 4 man teleport anywhere on the map. 

Would that be possible? And if so, what terrifyingly insane wombos could come of it?
